description: Wally Buchanan is an old friend of Erza`s, having known her since childhood during their slavery days working on the Tower of Heaven. He considers himself a "Dandy" man and tries to make himself look cool every chance he gets. Also has something of a square theme going from his attack and even his word bubbles are draw in a square style. He is later revealed to be Hoteye`s long lost brother.
name: Wally Buchanan
